alert.note: Alert for Coles; Cumberland (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 5:57PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Coles and northwestern Cumberland Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 557 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mattoon, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lerna around 615 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Janesville. This includes Interstate 57 between mile markers 176 and 188. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
